flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
De-clutter your apartment or house with quick storage options like these. Your friends will start calling you "Miss Organized" when they see you have a creative place for everything!

DIY Magazine - “A locally published magazine with a focus on women in the arts, Venus Zine features high-profile stars alongside independent artists. The magazine is jam-packed with profiles, interviews, and feature stories about female musicians, artists, filmmakers and designers. A magazine that shows women can rock.”

guide.title: Indie Home: Where did I put that?
